plot: The House of the Meyer Sisters - when a family decides to sell a brewery they are visited by multiple deaths - quirky Captain Marleau investigates

What is happening on the Meyer estate? Someone seems to have it in for this family of Alsatian brewers: on the point of selling the brewery, the patriarch, Frantz Meyer, is murdered and his wife attacked. Marleau quickly discovers that family unity is a mere façade hiding rivalry and tension.—Happy_Evil_Dude
